posts.post_title: Looking for THIS exact McGraw Lenox
posts.post_content:
I owned this card for a minute, last year (or was it two years ago), anyway...if the owner is willing to sell or trade, please send me a PM.

Thanks,
Michael

If the current owner could PM me, I'd appreciate it.

Thanks for looking...
